ISSUE.TITLE: `now whoami` not working in version 15.4.0
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: In version 15.4.0 the command `now whoami` throws the next error: ``` Error! The specified file or directory "whoami" does not exist. ``` When executing `now --help` the output displays `whoami` as a valid subcommand but, when executing `now --help whoami`, it throws the next error: ``` Error! The "whoami" subcommand does not exist ``` If this feature has been removed from the client the `now --help` output should be updated. If not, it seems there is a problem with the command.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Add `whoami` command back It was accidentally removed. Fixes #2410.
